name: WebGL2RenderingContext.clientWaitSync
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.clientWaitSync() method of the WebGL 2 API blocks and waits for a WebGLSync object to become signaled or a given timeout to be passed.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'clientWaitSync' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glClientWaitSync' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
